title: Memorializing Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to proclaim January 2011 as Keep New York State Warm Month
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE   RESOLUTION  memorializing  Governor  Andrew  M.  Cuomo  to
proclaim January 2011 as Keep New York State Warm Month

WHEREAS, It is incumbent upon the people of the State  of  New  York  to
recognize  and  acknowledge those within our midst who have made signif-
icant contributions to the quality of life therein; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to memorial-
ize Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to proclaim January 2011 as Keep  New  York
State Warm Month; and
  WHEREAS,  Dedicated  to meeting the needs of our citizens are generous
organizations, businesses and individuals across this great  State  that
work  to ensure the welfare of all fellow beings is an outstanding exam-
ple of commitment to this crucial and ongoing mission as upheld  by  its
sponsors; and
  WHEREAS,  Keep  New York State Warm Month will consist of massive coat
drives throughout the month of January; these coats will be  distributed
to shelters and churches and community centers; and
  WHEREAS,  The  distribution  will  take place on Saturday, January 29,
2011, at Westchester United Methodist Church in  the  Bronx,  New  York;
this  4th  Annual  special  drive  is sponsored by The National Cleaners
Association, Parkchester NAACP Branch, The United Coalition Association,
Inc., Adopt-a-Friend and New York Cares; and
  WHEREAS, It is fitting to acknowledge the valuable work carried out on
behalf of New York State  citizens  by  these  particular  sponsors;  by
giving  back  to  their communities, these individuals and organizations
exemplify the spirit of caring and concern that builds stronger communi-
ties and that defines all of the citizens  of  this  great  State;  now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
memorialize Governor Andrew M. Cuomo, to proclaim January 2011  as  Keep
New York State Warm Month; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  The Honorable Andrew M. Cuomo, Governor of the State of New
York, and to the aforementioned sponsors.
